textBeforeTable: Student Ethnicities Brooklawn is a public high school in Louisville. 95 students attend Brooklawn and identify mostly as White, non-Hispanic; Multiracial; and Black, non-Hispanic. 8% of the 95 students here are paying reduced lunch prices. The student to teacher ratio at Brooklawn is 3:1. Assumption High School is one of the nearest high schools. About this school We do not have any test data available for this school. % scale represents number of student who met or exceeded standards Kentucky state average Jefferson County School District average This school in 2014 Beginning in the 2011-12 school year, and continuing in 2013-2014, Kentucky administered the End-of-Course (EOC) assessments. EOCs are tests given to public high school students when they complete a course to assess their knowledge of important course concepts. They are similar to a final exam, except that they are created and scored by an outside testing company, ensuring that the tests are both rigorous and aligned with state and national college readiness standards.

Brooklawn Child & Family Services serves youth who need intensive therapeutic support to overcome the effects of abuse neglect or other family crisis situations. This is primarily a residential program and the facilities include an on-campus state-of-the-art public school.
